data.name: The Shattering - Secret Room
data.detailed_description:
The Shattering is presenting a mysterious Secret Room, a place filled with wonders and surprises.

This DLC comes with:
- Unlocking the last door in the Corridor with new game content
- Detailed environment to explore
- Objects and Scenes that were not used in the main game
- Developer commentary
- Option to replay individual Acts of the main story

Playing this DLC requires finishing the main story first.
